title: ELLEVEN High Stretchy Knit Straight Leg Sweatpant Jeans Women, Elastic Waist Wide Leg Baggy Jeans High Waisted Pull on Jeans
description: 【Denim Look, Sweatpants Comfort】Made from 4-way stretch knitted denim, these Sweatpant Jeans are soft like sweatpants, super breathable, and still maintain the classic look of jeans, offering the cozy, skin-friendly feel of sweatpants while keeping the classic style of denim

【Elastic Waistband & Button Closing】These Wide Leg Jeans Woman Designed with a back stretch waistband for easy slip-on wear, these jeans offer both a pull-on style and a traditional button and zipper ,Perfect for those seeking comfort, style, and practicality

【Relaxed, Flattering Style】Featuring a loose, wide-leg silhouette and a straight cut, these jeans provide a flattering, relaxed look that pairs well with any top. Perfect for casual outings or dress-down days

【Practical and Stylish】These Straight Leg Jeans for Women feature four practical pockets and a watch pocket for your phone, cash, and keys, offering both convenience and style. The included belt ensures a secure fit, blending comfort, practicality, and effortless fashion
【Tips & Care】Machine washable; iron at a low temperature if necessary. Please refer to our "Size Chart" for an accurate fit before ordering
